text:
ITEM 1! (b)
Rad. Com.
Istanbul
EDUCATIONAL RADIO :
1971 QUESTIONNAIRE ON EDUCATIONAL RADIO
As promised, M. J-F. Lawaetz has prepared a further followÂ¬
up questionnaire on trends in educational radio and this has been
dispatched to all members. Its results will be collated and analysed
before the Autumn 1971 meeting of the Committee and will be presented
to the Committee at that time.
In the meantime, the detailed information communicated as
a result of last year's questionnaire has been processed and issued
to all members by the Administrative Office.
